named-query.name: CMUSER_FIND_BY_EMAIL
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CmUserImpl c WHERE LOWER(c.email) = LOWER(?1)

named-query.name: CMUSER_FIND_BY_USERNAME
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CmUserImpl c WHERE LOWER(c.userName) = LOWER(?1)

named-query.name: CMUSER_FIND_BY_USERROLE_ID
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CmUserImpl c, IN(c.userRoles) role WHERE role.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CMUSER_COUNT_BY_USERNAME
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(c) FROM CmUserImpl c WHERE LOWER(c.userName) = LOWER(?1)

named-query.name: CMUSER_COUNT_BY_EMAIL
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(c) FROM CmUserImpl c WHERE LOWER(c.email) = LOWER(?1)

named-query.name: CMUSER_FIND_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CmUserImpl c WHERE c.guid = ?1

named-query.name: CMUSER_UIDS_SELECT_BY_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT c.uidPk FROM CmUserImpl as c WHERE c.lastModifiedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: CMUSER_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CmUserImpl c WHERE c.uidPk in (:list)

named-query.name: USERROLE_FIND_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserRoleImpl AS u WHERE u.name = ?1

named-query.name: USERROLE_FIND_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserRoleImpl AS u WHERE u.guid = ?1

named-query.name: USERROLE_SELECT_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserRoleImpl AS u

named-query.name: USERROLE_UID_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT ur.uidPk FROM CmUserImpl AS cu INNER JOIN cu.userRoles AS ur
